welcome_message_body: Welcome to Chichicastenango, known for its vibrant market and rich cultural heritage. We hope you enjoy the city's charm and take the time to explore all it has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Quiche Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Quiche Airport is used for the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
